item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Sounds like we'll be having a busy weekend. All the ideas sound good to me, but as you say rather weather dependant.</p>
item.content:encoded: Sounds like we’ll be having a busy weekend. All the ideas sound good to me, but as you say rather weather dependant.

item.title: By: Fi
item.dc:creator: Fi
item.description: <p>Been having a think about a few other attractions too. I guess the weather will influence - what do you fancy, museum, historic building, historic pumping station, large tree ?!! Did find some cool looking caves/ gorge but probably had better not do that myself at the mo!</p>
item.content:encoded: Been having a think about a few other attractions too. I guess the weather will influence – what do you fancy, museum, historic building, historic pumping station, large tree ?!! Did find some cool looking caves/ gorge but probably had better not do that myself at the mo!

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>How about Trent bridge and Nottinghamshire Cricket Club v Sussex at the weekend?</p>
item.content:encoded: How about Trent bridge and Nottinghamshire Cricket Club v Sussex at the weekend?
